product_a.how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

comparison_summary: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum contains Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid while RadiantPlus Vitamin C Serum contains Vitamin C, Niacinamide. GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is priced at ₹699, while RadiantPlus Vitamin C Serum costs ₹799.
